News.Title: Tirupati Forge Reports Decline in Q3 EBITDA and Margin
News.Summary: Tirupati Forge has reported a decrease in its third-quarter EBITDA, which fell to 26 million rupees from 40 million rupees in the same period last year. The company's EBITDA margin also declined, dropping to 9.95% from 12.24% year-over-year.

News.Title: Tirupati Forge Reports Decline in Q3 Profit and Revenue
News.Summary: Tirupati Forge has reported a decrease in both net profit and revenue for the third quarter compared to the same period last year. The company's net profit dropped to 13 million rupees from 21 million rupees year-over-year. Similarly, revenue declined to 261 million rupees from 323 million rupees in the previous year's corresponding quarter.

News.Title: Tirupati Forge Announces Share and Warrant Issuance
News.Summary: Tirupati Forge has announced plans to issue up to 14.7 million new shares and up to 12.3 million convertible equity warrants. Both the shares and warrants will be priced at 32 rupees each.
